Title: Poltergeist
Description: Similar to ghosts, but torments humans

Title: Demon
Description: Unspeakably evil, possesses humans and may make them perform horrific acts

Title: Genie/Jinn
Description: From Islam, could be good or evil. Evil Jinns lead people into temptation

Title: Siren
Description: Song leads sailors off course causing them to wreck their ship

Title: Werewolf
Description: Every full moon, a human transforms into a werewolf that hunts and kills prey

Title: Sea Monster
Description: Roams bodies of waters looking for victims

Title: Big Foot
Description: Stalks in forests preying on wild animals and sometimes humans

Title: Vampire
Description: Drains and drinks blood from victims

Title: Zombie
Description: Eats human flesh and bites transforms victims into zombies

Title: Witch
Description: Curses victims and communicates with demons

Title: Werewolf
Description: Every full moon, a human transforms into a werewolf that hunts and kills prey
